# Elemental Protection, Improved
## Overview
**Elemental Protection, Improved:** The improved version of this augmentation absorbs the first 120 points of damage from a specific energy type (acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic) per day.

*Caster Level:* 10th (improved elemental protection); *Prerequisites:* [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *protection from elements; Market Price:* 15,000 gp (improved elemental protection).
